Projects.name: Delphus
Projects.description: ðŸ”¬ Secure, decentralized, and open scientific study management platform. Using the blockchain, Delphus immutably timestamps and records all consent and data points to provide transparency at every step. It stores data on a network of servers around the world, preserving data accessibility and allowing control on a per-site and per-investigator basis. This makes research auditable and verifiable, saving trust, time, and money
